Posts.Content: It is very difficult if you cant get help because of your financial status and being only a child and your mother passing away would make anyone realize how cold this life can be. I am very sorry to hear your situation, all I can say is in my case similar to your's i went to the doctors hospital and told them i need it to apply for financial aid, some people call it medicare or medical. I know the city i live in also has medical aid. And maybe your city does two. Anyways don't give up my heart goes out to you and were there is a will there is a way. Financial Help from the government try there
Posts.Signature: Live, Give, Love to the MAX
Posts.Title: MY 15 OLD BROTHER MIGHT HAVE BREAST CANCER,NO $ OR INSURANCE

Posts.Content: Wow thanks for posting to share the really hard experiences that your family is going thru. I can only imagine man that just plain sucks. I hope in my heart the best outcome for her and your family. Love, Felipe Cabesas

Posts.Title: My mum is dying from secondary breast cancer..its sooo sad
